title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\UpdateNodePoolRequest
name: UpdateNodePoolRequest
description:
UpdateNodePoolRequests update a node pool's image and/or version.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.UpdateNodePoolRequest

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: The Google Developers Console project ID or project number.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: The name of the cluster to upgrade.

params.name: data.node_pool_id
params.description: The name of the node pool to upgrade.

params.name: data.node_version
params.description: The Kubernetes version to change the nodes to (typically an upgrade). Use - to upgrade to the latest version supported by the server.

params.name: data.image_type
params.description: The desired image type for the node pool.
